blogPost.excerpt: The only eCommerce single-click ad spend optimizer. We here at Optily want to help you make the most of the advertising budget you have to work with. Our fees are flat, not based on what you spend, so we’re in it to help you win.
blogPost.body: The only eCommerce single-click ad spend optimizer. We here at Optily want to help you make the most of the advertising budget you have to work with. Our fees are flat, not based on what you spend, so we’re in it to help you win.
blogPost.title: Optily - The only eCommerce single-click ad spend optimizer.
blogPost.author: Max Tomlinson

localize.description: 唯一的电商单次点击广告花费优化器。在Optily，我们希望帮助您充分利用您的广告预算。我们的收费是统一的，而不是基于您的花费，所以我们是为了帮助您赢。
localize.tagline: 唯一的电商单次点击广告花费优化器。

localize.description: 唯一的電商單次點擊廣告花費優化器。在Optily，我們希望幫助您充分利用您的廣告預算。我們的收費是統一的，而不是基於您的花費，所以我們是爲了幫助您贏。
localize.tagline: 唯一的電商單次點擊廣告花費優化器。

previous.excerpt: Sprouter’s mission is to connect people and share life’s best moments faster than ever before while not only enhancing your overall social media experience, but the ecosystem of social media itself.
previous.title: Sprouter - Sprouter is the fastest way to share your social medias

localize.description: Sprouter的使命是比以往任何时候都更快地连接人们并分享生活中最美好的时刻，同时不仅提升你的整体社交媒体体验，而且提升社交媒体本身的生态系统。
localize.tagline: Sprouter是分享你的社交媒体的最快方式。

localize.description: Sprouter的使命是比以往任何時候都更快地連接人們並分享生活中最美好的時刻，同時不僅提升你的整體社交媒體體驗，而且提升社交媒體本身的生態系統。
localize.tagline: Sprouter是分享你的社交媒體的最快方式。

next.excerpt: The real metal finish on the main camera adds unity to the design and accentuates the luxury of the haze texture. It’s an iconic new camera design made to turn heads.
next.title: Samsung Galaxy S21 5G - Samsungs newest range of 5G smartphones

localize.description: 主摄像头上的真金属处理增加了设计的统一性，并突出了雾霾质感的豪华感。这是一款标志性的新相机设计，让人眼前一亮。
localize.tagline: 三星最新的5G智能手机系列。

localize.description: 主攝像頭上的真金屬處理增加了設計的統一性，並突出了霧霾質感的豪華感。這是一款標誌性的新相機設計，讓人眼前一亮。
localize.tagline: 三星最新的5G智能手機系列。
